DynValueToObjectOfTypeWeight
internal static int DynValueToObjectOfTypeWeight(
DynValue value,
Type desiredType,
bool isOptional
)

Gets a relative weight of how much the conversion is matching the given types.  Implementation must follow that of DynValueToObjectOfType.. it's not very DRY in that sense.  However here we are in perf-sensitive path.. TODO : double-check the gain and see if a DRY impl is better.
